entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Broadview
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:55 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Broadview 12:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -16.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: E 36 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
